title: Looking for a committed duo partner for RANKED games. NO NOOBS.
body: My name is Apex661 and i'm currently bronze 4. I started off with silver 3 but they're fking so many trolls and feeders. I try to carry myself out of it but some games i cant because fkers go 0-12 1-19 and shiet... Please i need a committed player that will carry with me.

replies.body: LMAO bronze 4 asking for no noobs
You think he'd be more polite and understanding about it.
haha mreinzy got butthurt and reported my commented awwwww

> haha mreinzy got butthurt and reported my commented awwwww

i diddnt report anythign you idiot hahaha maybe if ur brain starts functioning you can get out of bronze
